content: **crocheted hat in drops bomull-lin or drops paris the piece is worked in the round top down with stripes sizes s - xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern l-166 yarn group c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head-size 54/56 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100 g colour 11 beige 50-50 g colour 21 dark blue or use drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100 g colour 67 wheat 50-50 g colour 103 dark wash **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 16 double crochets in width and 18 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
